thread.title: Justin Bieber Might Have A 'Purpose' To Visit India, 2017 Just Got Made For Beliebers! - Storypick
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber Might Have A 'Purpose' To Visit India, 2017 Just Got Made For Beliebers! - Storypick

title: Justin Bieber Might Have A 'Purpose' To Visit India, 2017 Just Got Made For Beliebers! - Storypick
text:
7th January 2017 TOTAL SHARES 
If you are in India and you are a Justin Bieber fan, then let me tell you, 2017 just got made for you, guys! The 22-year-old ‘Baby’ hitmaker might just come to India as a part of his ‘Purpose’ tour. On an extensive Asia tour, rumour has it that Justin might make a stop at the Mumbai. Wondering where? He might even perform at DY Patil Stadium. Image Source 
After the magic Coldplay weaved at the Global Citizen India Festival, the news of Justin’s one-night-show at Mumbai is getting his fans super-psyched. Image Source 
Shailendra Singh, inceptor of Sunburn, is trying his best to bring Justin to India, according to a Mumbai Mirror report. 
After Jennifer Lopez, Nicole Scherzinger Coldplay, Jay Z, Demi Lovato, The Vamps, we think India is ready for Justin Bieber, too. Don’t be ‘Sorry’ if he doesn’t!
